name: MyWAC
0:
”Alexa, turn on Kitchen light”
”Alexa, set Kitchen light to Soft White.”
”Alexa, set Kitchen light brightness to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
WAC Smart Lights are the future of smart home lighting, designed to adapt to your routine, reduce energy costs, and make life simpler all year-round.

MyWAC skill for Amazon Alexa integration allows you to sync up your WAC Smart Light(s) products with an Amazon Echo device to enable voice-activated commands and more.

To get started, select the "ENABLE" button in your Alexa app and log in. Authorize the link to the WAC account used with your MyWAC app, and then Alexa will discover devices. For more details, see Connect a Smart Home Device to Alexa. 

The MyWAC skill discovers and displays your WAC Smart products.

For convenience, we recommend creating groups of your light fixtures in your MyWAC app before linking the MyWAC skill. Once the groups are discovered by the Alexa, you can simply say, "Alexa, Turn on Basement lights", and Alexa will turn on the required lights for the group.

For questions or comments, please visit our website at: https://www.waclighting.com/
